about_the_game:
Spot The Differences 2020 is a classic game to find different.

Collect a large number of scenery, places of interest, beautiful women pictures, find out the difference, complete the challenge, test your eyesight and test your efficiency.

This is a pure game for everyone to find Differences. It's rich in content and cheap. It's definitely a good game for your leisure and entertainment.




The game includes:

  • 50 different levels

  • Three different difficulties

  • Beautiful pictures

  • 5 great soundtracks

content_descriptors.notes: There are only some beauties with exposed clothes, but there is no other adult content. All characters are over the age of 18

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Home Premium or better
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Due E6300 or AMD althon X2 5000+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 7300GT or ATI X1600
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Due Q6600 or AMD Althon X4 635
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX760 or ATI R7 260X
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
